text: Backaland is a settlement on the island of Eday in Orkney, Scotland. The settlement is also within the parish of Eday, and it is located to the south west of the island. Backaland is situated at the southern end of the B9063. ==References== ==External links== *Ports and Harbours of the UK - Backaland (Eday) *The Megalithic Portal - Green Farm, Eday *The Megalithic Portal - Southside Standing Stone, Eday Category:Villages in Orkney Category:Eday
title: Backaland
